questions.stem: You are in charge of 1.3-kilogram- preterm baby in the NICU and you decide to give him formula. Why do you better pick the preterm ?
options: It has higher lactose content than term formula.
It has higher protein content than term formula.
It has lower calorie content than mature formula.
Lipids are in the form of long chain fatty acids

questions.stem: To ensure successful breast feeding, what would be a correct advice to give to the mother?
options: Avoid skin to skin contact with the newborn baby.
Start giving oral glucose immediately after delivery.
Start pacifier use immediately after delivery.
Try to establish early breast feeding.
